unnormalised: Real estate firm, Gupta & Sons, announces the launch of its new residential project, "Sunrise Apartments," located at 78, Nehru Nagar, Bhopal, MP, 462003. The project boasts 2BHK and 3BHK flats ranging from 900 sq ft to 1200 sq ft. Bookings are now open, with an initial deposit of Rs. 50,000 required.
normalised: real estate firm, Gupta and Sons, announces the launch of its new residential project, "Sunrise Apartments," located at seventy eight, Nehru Nagar, Bhopal, M-P, four hundred and sixty two thousand three. The project boasts two B-H-K and three B-H-K flats ranging from nine hundred square feet to one thousand two hundred square feet. Bookings are now open, with an initial deposit of rupee fifty thousand required.

unnormalised: The complex features modern amenities including a swimming pool, gymnasium, and 24/7 security. Prices start at Rs. 45 lakh for a 2BHK. Interested buyers can visit the site office at the same address or contact Mr. Rajesh Kumar at 9876543210 for more details. Possession is expected by Dec 2025.
normalised: The complex features modern amenities including a swimming pool, gymnasium, and twenty four seven security. Prices start at rupee forty five lakh for a two B-H-K. Interested buyers can visit the site office at the same address or contact Mister Rajesh Kumar at nine eight seven six five four three two one zero for more details. Possession is expected by December two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: The launch event is scheduled for 10/11/2024 at 11:00 AM. Gupta & Sons aims to cater to the growing demand for affordable housing in Bhopal with this project. The project is approved under RERA with registration number MP/RE/2024/P/1234.
normalised: The launch event is scheduled for tenth November two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero A-M. Gupta and Sons aims to cater to the growing demand for affordable housing in Bhopal with this project. The project is approved under R-E-R-A with registration number M-P slash R-E slash two thousand and twenty four slash P slash one two three four.
